reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 77/91: APPROVAL OF LOANS AND GUARANTEES
reg_info.act_under: Development Corporations Act   Loi sur les sociétés de développement

content.content: 1. A loan or a guarantee given for the payment of a loan under clause 13 (1) (a) or (b) of the Act that is in excess of $1,000,000 may be made only with the approval of the Lieutenant Governor in Council. O. Reg. 77/91, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. A loan or a guarantee given for the payment of a loan under clause 13 (1) (a) or (b) of the Act that is in excess of $1,000,000 may be made only with the approval of the Lieutenant Governor in Council. O. Reg. 77/91, s. 1.
